nodes.text: Landing pad nine, also known as platform 9 was the ninth landing pad at the Imperial security complex on Scarif. Prior to the Battle of Scarif, the stolen Zeta-class Heavy Cargo Shuttle SW-0608 piloted by the rebel squad "Rogue One" landed on landing pad nine.

An Imperial inspection team arrived via the tram and headed inside the cargo shuttle, only to find that there were hidden rebels, and was ambushed. Further being supposedly killed. Then, a shoretrooper threw a thermal imploder inside the cargo shuttle, destroying the entire vehicle and creating extensive damage to the landing pad.
